Class CcddJTableHandler.MultiLineCellEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractCellEditor
      • javax.swing.DefaultCellEditor
        • CCDD.CcddJTableHandler.MultiLineCellEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.CellEditor, javax.swing.table.TableCellEditor, javax.swing.tree.TreeCellEditor
    Enclosing class:
    CcddJTableHandler

    private class CcddJTableHandler.MultiLineCellEditor
extends javax.swing.DefaultCellEditor
    Create a cell editor for cells that can display text on more than one line. This allows adjusting the row height to fit the text as it is added or deleted
